title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.1 - Legal basis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 18.1 - Legal basis

State Regulations

This Part is designed to implement subdivision 3 of section
508
of the

Correction Law which provides for the treatment and hospitalization of mentally
ill prisoners in jails, other than prisoners serving
sentence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
18.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
